document_data.name: Zaki
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zaki''' was a [[tiefling]] child who was among those exiled from [[Elturel]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You don't look so tough. Mol fought off a hobgoblin all by herself.|Zaki}}
document_data.Description: Zaki had light red skin and two larger horns that went nearly straight upwards. He wore a simple, blue-grey cloth tunic wrapped in a leather girdle, atop cloth pants.
document_data.Activities: He was one of the members of the gang led by another tiefling child, [[Mol]].
document_data.History: After the tieflings of Elturel were kicked out of the city in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, many of them journeyed west to [[Baldur's Gate]] under the leadership of [[Zevlor]]. During the trek, many of the children found safety banding together and fending for themselves. Mol emerged as their leader, and helped them established a little hideaway when the refugees took shelter in the [[Emerald Grove]] for a time.
